name: ADRIFT (Davide A. Fiandra)
description:
ADRIFT is an endless drifter that you can experience through the use of one single button (or your mouse... actually if you're not using your mouse you're also gonna need the directional arrows for the menus).

Play as an astronaut that has been drifting aimlessly, lost in space. Ration your resources, avoid dangers, and try to survive!

ADRIFT has been made as part of #LOWREZJAM 2016
